Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components

Class ChatDisplay

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.ChatDisplay
public class ChatDisplay extends Object
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the chat.
